.]] , Bulgaria]] .]] , Washington, D.C.]] 'Education' in its general sense is a
form of learning in which the knowledge, skills, and habits of a group of people
are transferred from one generation to the next through teaching, training, or
research. Education frequently takes place under the guidance of others, but may
also be autodidactic. {{cite book
| last = Dewey first = John title = Democracy and Education publisher = The Free
| Press date = 1916/1944 pages = 1â4 isbn = 0-684-83631-9}} Any experience
| that has a formative effect on the way one thinks, feels, or acts may be
| considered educational.
